grails-app.domain.ReportEditorMain.MediaCenter
Class Media

java.lang.Object
  grails-app.domain.ReportEditorMain.MediaCenter.Media

class Media

The class MediaCenter matches the "Mediathek" (media library) from the STORM concept paper. All meta-data about the stored media-files is listed in this class. Local files can be uploaded, supportet formats are:

  • wmv - Windows Media
  • mpg - Quicktime
  • avi - Quicktime
  • rm - Real Media
  • mov - Quicktime
  • ogg - Flash
  • mp3 - Quicktime
  • swf - Flash
  • gif
  • jpg
  • png
Uploaded files are not stored in the database, but in the filesystem. All media files have to be present in the media library in order to be used in articles.
author:
Gerrit Meerpohl, Olaf Roeder
